KibokoTours.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1-2       Samburu Sopa Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Samburu NR     All Meals Included                   +9 Photos          +8 Photos              All Meals Included       3       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       4       Lake Nakuru Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Lake Nakuru NP     All Meals Included                   +10 Photos          +9 Photos              All Meals Included       5-6       Masai Mara Sopa Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Masai Mara NR     All Meals Included                   +6 Photos          +5 Photos              All Meals Included       7       Muthu Lake Naivasha Country Club     Luxury hotel at Lake Naivasha (Naivasha)     All Meals Included                   +6 Photos          +5 Photos              All Meals Included       8-9       Amboseli Sopa Lodge     Mid-range lodge just outside Amboseli NP     All Meals Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              All Meals Included       10      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast Included           Breakfast Included
KibokoTours.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees
KibokoTours.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
